channel.title: [Class Suggestion] the Spirit
channel.description:
the Spirit (Neutral Killer)
**Passive Ability 1:** _Energetic_ - Immune to everything on a night you attack.
**Passive Ability 2:** _Only one_ - Cannot become unique roles. You can still kill them though.
**Day Ability 1:** _Exhaust_ - Disable a players access to day abilites. (2 Uses)
**Day Ability 2:** _Seer_ - Determine a players class type. (3 Uses)
**Night Ability 1:** _Haunt_ - Kill a player and become them. Your original body dies with their role.
**Goal:** Kill everyone who doesnt need to survive.
**Lore:** **TODO**
**Comments:** Some extra notes:
If you attack and are occupied. You still keep the night immunity. But don't kill.

item.description:

  1. No Goal?
  2. You’re commenting on everything about ‘Balance’ but your suggestion would break a lot of the current balance in ToL.
  3. Roleblock -> Occupy | Role -> Class

item.title: [Class Suggestion] the Spirit
item.dc:creator: Bounty
item.description:
Did you seem to get your day abilities confused ?
Why would you need role block immunity when you’re not doing any thing ?
The day abilities are not creative and they seem just a rip off from other existing classes. You also can’t have three passives.

The silence thing is unnecessary and I don’t think we need any more silencing when the reaper exists.

Read full topic
